title: Sometimes I Think of You
description: Max Crestfield is the first person Alena Rogers has ever met that doesn't see her as one of the famous Alphabet Babies. Being a sextuplet is both the most wonderful and the most difficult part of her life. For a little while when Alena meets Max she gets to leave that hard part of her life behind and just be a girl falling in love with a boy.When Alena's lies catch up to her there's nothing she can say that will salvage her summer romance. But some summer loves don't fade away.
author: T.J. Dell
